original: @#/_/rje btshun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/
analyzed: @#/_/rje btshun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/
translated: The Sadhana of Noble Tara

original: @go  / @#@#/_/rje btshun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs pan+di ta gnas brtan dpe🔽med kyis bsrungs pas mdzad par/_de'i rjes su sngar snying gar gnas pa'i ri
analyzed: @go  / @#@#/_/rje btshun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs pan+di ta gnas brtan dpe med kyis bsrungs pas mdzad par/_de'i rjes su sngar snying gar gnas pa'i ri
translated: The Sadhana of Noble Tara, composed by the elder pandita Vimuktisena,🔽after that, in the center of the mandala marked with the sign of the deer

original: dwags kyi mtshhan ma can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na yod pa'i ut+pal sngon po rol
analyzed: dwags kyi mtshhan ma can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na yod pa'i ut+pal sngon po rol
translated: on a blue utpala flower in the center of the abode of the sign of the🔽moon,

original: pa'i lte ba'i nang na gnas pa'i mtshhan mo'i mgon po'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i
analyzed: pa'i lte ba'i nang na gnas pa'i mtshhan mo'i mgon po'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i
translated: in the center of the mandala of the Lord of Signs,🔽from the seed syllable tam,🔽the Bhagavati Noble Tara,

original: tam yig ser po'i sa bon las/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma sku mdog
analyzed: tam yig ser po'i sa bon las/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma sku mdog
translated: supreme in color,🔽with two hands,

original: ljang gu mchog can/_phyag gnyis na zhal rab tu bzhad pa/_yon tan bla na
analyzed: ljang gu mchog can/_phyag gnyis na zhal rab tu bzhad pa/_yon tan bla na
translated: with a face that is very smiling,🔽the basis of all unsurpassed qualities,

original: med pa ma lus pa'i gzhi/_skyon ma lus pa dang bral ba lha las byung ba'i gser
analyzed: med pa ma lus pa'i gzhi/_skyon ma lus pa dang bral ba lha las byung ba'i gser
translated: free from all faults,

original: dang nor bu dang mu tig gi rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa do shal gyi
analyzed: dang nor bu dang mu tig gi rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa do shal gyi
translated: adorned with ornaments of gold, jewels, pearls, and precious substances that🔽have arisen from the gods,🔽adorned with a necklace,

original: phreng ba yid 'phrog pa brgya yis nu ma zung la rgyan du byas pa/_lha las byung ba'i
analyzed: phreng ba yid 'phrog pa brgya yis nu ma zung la rgyan du byas pa/_lha las byung ba'i
translated: Her breasts are adorned with a hundred captivating garlands.

original: khrig ma'i dang rgyan dang dpung rgyan la sogs pas phyag gnyis brgyan pa/_ska
analyzed: khrig ma'i dang rgyan dang dpung rgyan la sogs pas phyag gnyis brgyan pa/_ska
translated: Her two arms are adorned with bracelets, armlets, and so forth, which are made of divine🔽gold.

original: rags kyi nor bu dri ma med pa'i tshhogs kyi 'od zer gyi phreng bas rked pa'i rgyab kyi cha🔽shin tu mdzes par byas pa/_rin po che sna tshhogs pas spras pa'i rkang gdub 'khrol
analyzed: rags kyi nor bu dri ma med pa'i tshhogs kyi 'od zer gyi phreng bas rked pa'i rgyab kyi cha shin tu mdzes par byas pa/_rin po che sna tshhogs pas spras pa'i rkang gdub 'khrol
translated: Her waist is beautified by a garland of the light rays of the assembly of🔽stainless jewels.

original: bas zhabs gnyis rnam par mdzes par byas pa/_shing yongs su 'du la sogs
analyzed: bas zhabs gnyis rnam par mdzes par byas pa/_shing yongs su 'du la sogs
translated: Her two feet are beautified by anklets that jingle with various jewels.

original: pa'i me tog gi snye ma kun du phreng bar byas pa yongs su rgyas pas dbu skra mdzes par🔽bcings pa/_bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs pas dbu'i
analyzed: pa'i me tog gi snye ma kun du phreng bar byas pa yongs su rgyas pas dbu skra mdzes par bcings pa/_bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs pas dbu'i
translated: Her hair is beautified by a braid of fully opened flower buds, such as🔽jasmine, and so forth.🔽Her head is beautified by the Tathāgata Amoghasiddhi.

original: phyogs rnam par gsal bar byas pa/_sku khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa/
analyzed: phyogs rnam par gsal bar byas pa/_sku khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa/
translated: Her body is endowed with special qualities.

original: mchog tu sgeg pa 'bar ba'i sku can/_mngon par gsal ba'i lang tshho dang ldan ma/
analyzed: mchog tu sgeg pa 'bar ba'i sku can/_mngon par gsal ba'i lang tshho dang ldan ma/
translated: She has a blazing body of supreme beauty and is endowed with the radiance of youth.

original: ston ka'i ut+pal sngon po dri ma med pa'i 'dab ma lta bu'i spyan can/_lha'i gos kyi🔽na bzas sku g.yogs pa/_shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshhad tsham pa'i pad+ma dkar po'i
analyzed: ston ka'i ut+pal sngon po dri ma med pa'i 'dab ma lta bu'i spyan can/_lha'i gos kyi na bzas sku g.yogs pa/_shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshhad tsham pa'i pad+ma dkar po'i
translated: Her eyes are like the petals of a spotless blue autumn lotus, and she is dressed in divine garments.

original: steng du bsil ba'i 'od zer can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na skyil krung phyed pas🔽bzhugs pa/_phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/_g.yon pas rnam par rgyas shing
analyzed: steng du bsil ba'i 'od zer can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/_phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/_g.yon pas rnam par rgyas shing
translated: She sits on a white lotus the size of a chariot wheel, in the center of a mandala of cool-rayed canopies, in the half-crossed-legged posture.

original: mdzes pa'i ut+pal sngon po 'dzin par grub par byas nas bsam par bya'o/_/de
analyzed: mdzes pa'i ut+pal sngon po 'dzin par grub par byas nas bsam par bya'o/_/de
translated: Her right hand is in the gesture of supreme generosity, and her left hand holds a beautiful, fully blossomed blue utpala flower.🔽Visualize her in this way.

original: ltar bu'i ngo bo'i bcom ldan 'das ma ji srid 'dod pa de srid du bsgom par bya'o/_/
analyzed: ltar bu'i ngo bo'i bcom ldan 'das ma ji srid 'dod pa de srid du bsgom par bya'o/_/
translated: Meditate on the Bhagavatī in this form for as long as you wish.

original: zhes gsungs so/_/'di'i dbu zhabs rnams ni slob dpon 'di nyid kyis mdzad
analyzed: zhes gsungs so/_/'di'i dbu zhabs rnams ni slob dpon 'di nyid kyis mdzad
translated: The entire text was composed by this master.

original: pa'i mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nam _mkha' la gshegs pa'i sgrub🔽thabs dang 'dra se snang ngo //_//mam ga la b+ha wa tu//_//
